page.title: 02 Reclaimed Land Use
page.content: Mr Crook's reclamation has meant that the coast line has been changed,and a new O.S.map is being prepared as a result. On this land he grows cabbage,peas, potatoes,sprouts,swedes,spring barley, and winter wheat,covering in total around 550 acres. Also, he has winter grazing for sheep. When this land was reclaimed,100 miles of drains and 3 miles of road were laid,an electricity substation was erected,and 200,000,000 pounds were spent.He also built the biggest farm building in Lancashire,measuring 250Â£ by 100Â£ clear span. In the original Domesday Book there is mention of the "Snotterstone",which was lost during the passage of time. During the excavations this stone was recovered,and will soon be on display.
